xwikidoc.content: entitynamevalidation.currentStrategy.label=현재 명명 전략 entitynamevalidation.currentStrategy.hint=이름 전략은 문서를 생성하거나 이름을 바꾸거나 저장할 때 사용됩니다. entitynamevalidation.useTransformation.label=자동으로 이름 변환 entitynamevalidation.useTransformation.hint=활성화하면 가능한 경우 이름 전략을 사용하여 이름을 자동으로 조정합니다. entitynamevalidation.useValidation.label=저장하기 전에 이름을 확인하세요 entitynamevalidation.useValidation.hint=활성화된 경우 이름 전략은 저장하기 전에 이름의 유효성을 검사합니다. 이 기능을 사용하면 일부 기존 문서가 저장되지 않을 수 있으므로 주의해서 사용하세요. entitynamevalidation.ReplaceCharacterEntityNameValidation.name=캐릭터 교체 entitynamevalidation.SlugEntityNameValidation.name=미리 형식이 지정된 이름(악센트 없음, 공백 없음, 특수 문자 없음) entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.configuration=캐릭터 교체 전략 구성 entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.label=역이 저장되었지만, 일부 새롭게 실패한 검사가 있습니다: 일치하지 않는 마침표(.) entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.hint=선택한 이름 전략의 동작을 확인할 수 있습니다. entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.placeholder=테스트할 페이지 이름을 여기에 입력하세요. entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.validName=선택한 전략에 이 이름이 유효합니까? entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.transformedName=선택한 전략에 따른 변환 후의 이름: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.livetable.forbiddenCharacter=금지된 문자 entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.livetable.replacementCharacter=대체 문자 entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.livetable._actions=행위 ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.add=Add new character ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.addNewCharacter=Add new character to forbid or replace ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.label=New forbidden character ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.hint=This character will be forbidden in page names ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.placeholder=Type here the new forbidden character ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.label=New replacement character ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.hint=This character will replace the forbidden character in page names. If not specified, the forbidden character will be removed from page names. ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.placeholder=Type here the new replacement character or leave empty ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.create.inProgress=New forbidden character is being added... ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.create.done=New forbidden character has been successfully added. ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.create.failed=Error when adding the new forbidden character. ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter=Deletion of a forbidden character ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter.warning=Are you sure to delete this forbidden character? ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter.remove=Delete ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.remove.inProgress=The forbidden character is being deleted... ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.remove.done=The forbidden character has been deleted. ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.remove.failed=Error when deleting a forbidden character. ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.emptyReplacementCharacter=None ### Missing: entitynamevalidation.admin.heading=Name Strategies ### Missing: admin.namestrategies=Name Strategies
